about_the_game:
Your ducks have worked tirelessly to amass a fortune in gold and diamonds, but their hard-earned treasure has caught the eye of a ruthless chicken gang. These feathered fiends are on a mission to plunder your wealth and decimate your duck army.

With addictive gameplay, endless challenges, and a touch of feathered fun, Quacker Bros offers hours of entertainment for strategy enthusiasts and casual gamers alike.



It's time to quack back! Upgrade your ducks, unlock new and powerful units, and fortify your defenses to withstand the increasing ferocity of the chicken onslaught.



Build and command an unstoppable force of ducks, each with unique abilities. Strategically deploy your troops to protect your bounty from wave after wave of chicken invaders.



But beware! The chickens are cunning and relentless. They'll hatch new tactics and stronger birds to challenge your defenses. Can you outsmart these feathered foes and secure your fortune? Only the most strategic and fearless duck commander will prevail.

With addictive gameplay, endless challenges, and a touch of feathered fun, Quacker Bros offers hours of entertainment for strategy enthusiasts and casual gamers alike.



It's time to quack back! Upgrade your ducks, unlock new and powerful units, and fortify your defenses to withstand the increasing ferocity of the chicken onslaught.



Build and command an unstoppable force of ducks, each with unique abilities. Strategically deploy your troops to protect your bounty from wave after wave of chicken invaders.



But beware! The chickens are cunning and relentless. They'll hatch new tactics and stronger birds to challenge your defenses. Can you outsmart these feathered foes and secure your fortune? Only the most strategic and fearless duck commander will prevail.
name: Quacker Bros : First Heist

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+ or higher, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 3.2GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770 or AMD Radeon R9 280 with 3 GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Quacker Bros is a roguelike TD game about protecting your bounty from the intercepting chicken Mafia! Survive until the help comes and you can finally enjoy the blood and sweat of your heist!
